${ModID}:MasterSpark.NAME: Master Spark
${ModID}:MasterSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : NL Deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:RisingStrike.NAME: Rising Strike
${ModID}:RisingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Charge Up. NL Startup: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Charge Up.

${ModID}:LuminousStrike.NAME: Luminous Strike
${ModID}:LuminousStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Amplify [E] [E] : Increase damage equal to current energy times !M!.

${ModID}:ShootingEcho.NAME: Shooting Echo
${ModID}:ShootingEcho.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Exhaust a card to add a copy of this into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:StardustReverie.NAME: Stardust Reverie
${ModID}:StardustReverie.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! card. Gain ${ModID}:Charge Up equal to two times its cost including ${ModID}:Amplify. NL Draw !M! card.
${ModID}:StardustReverie.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! cards. Gain ${ModID}:Charge Up equal to two times their costs including ${ModID}:Amplify. NL Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:Inertia.NAME: Inertia
${ModID}:Inertia.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted or ${ModID}:Amplified, gain !M! ${ModID}:Charge Up.

${ModID}:UltimateShortwave.NAME: Ultimate Shortwave
${ModID}:UltimateShortwave.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E] and !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Charge Up. NL ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : Increase both values by 1 this combat.
${ModID}:UltimateShortwave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! [E] and !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Charge Up. NL ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : Increase both values by 1 this combat.

${ModID}:DragonMeteor.NAME: Dragon Meteor
${ModID}:DragonMeteor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals an additional !M! damage for each card in your exhaust pile.

${ModID}:EarthlightRay.NAME: Earthlight Ray
${ModID}:EarthlightRay.DESCRIPTION: After you gain ${ModID}:Charge Up, deal damage equal to its total to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Spark.NAME: Spark
${ModID}:Spark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Charge Up. NL Exhaust.
